T:JetBrains.dotCover.Reporting.Html.FileExistanceAnalyser
member.summary:
Checking for file existance takes about 10ms. In ReSharper snapshot we have info about 15000 files. This means that total time consumption for this operation is about 2 minutes.
This class is introduced to: - ensure that we do not check for existance of any file twice - minimize number of checks where possible (e.g. if source files are unavailable)

member.name: M:JetBrains.dotCover.Reporting.ICoverageNodeVisitor.VisitNode(JetBrains.dotCover.CoverageModel.ICoverageNode,System.Action)
member.summary: Visits node and decides if children should be visited
member.param: delegate for visiting children, null if no children are avaiable
